contest-event.event-date: Oct. 29, 1955 D National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) 1 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-championship-section European Championships The current Nationals contest began in 1900, but there was a previous 'Nationals' contest run 40 years earlier: Enderby Jackson's Great National Contest. Championship Blackfriars Royal Albert Hall, Kensington, Kensington and Chelsea, Greater London, England, UK Edric Cundell was the appointed referee. Prizes: 1st: 200 Guineas 2nd: 150 Guineas 3rd: 75 Guineas 4th: 50 Guineas At 3.15pm on the day the BBC had a 'live' pickup from the contest itself for the results.
